page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: THE FOLLOWING TEACHERS AND PUPILS WERE INVOLVED IN THE{DOOMSDAY PROJECT. { MR. R. MCNEIL HEAD TEACHER { MISS E. GRAY ASSISTANT TEACHER { JAMES SCOTT PUPIL AGED 8 { ISLA MACDONALD PUPIL AGED 8 { SHONA ANDERSON PUPIL AGED 8 { KELLY RHODICK PUPIL AGED 8 { MARK ROBERTSON PUPIL AGED 8 { KAREN MACLARTY PUPIL AGED 8 { LORNA SCOTT PUPIL AGED 9 { ALAN PEACOCK PUPIL AGED 10 { YVONNE MCCUAIG PUPIL AGED 10 { DAVID RHODICK PUPIL AGED 11 { ELIZABETH MACVEAN PUPIL AGED 10 { GORDON MCCUAIG PUPIL AGED 12 { WALTER MCCUAIG PUPIL AGED 11 { KENNETH ROBERTSON PUPIL AGED 12 { RHONA SCOTT PUPIL AGED 12 { }ALL REPORTS, SURVEYS AND PHOTOGRAPHS WERE COMPILED BY THE ABOVE PEOPLE.
